content.raw:
I don't think that it would be too much trouble to support ign-math2 or ign-math3 the point was try to migrate all gazebo8 dependencies to support just ign-math3 in order to avoid mixing of different ABIs. This will not be a problem for building the packages just using ign-math3.

For the people building from source, we are controlling the versions with this PR (requires ign-math3 installed in the system so the people need to have it in the system) and with a stricter requirement in gazebo8 (require sdformat4 > 4.3.0).

If we support ign-math2 and ign-math3 we open the door of being able to have a build from source of the next sdformat (4.3.0) with gazebo8 having other dependencies using ign-math3.
